temperature.title: Temperature
temperature.description: Controls how creative or predictable the model's responses are.
temperature.lowDesc: More consistent and precise responses. Ideal for data analysis.
temperature.mediumDesc: Good balance between precision and variety.
temperature.highDesc: More varied and creative responses, but less predictable.
temperature.recommendation: For this type of analysis, a low value (0 - 0.3) is recommended for more reliable results.

ollamaModels.title: Installed Models ({{count}})
ollamaModels.lastModelHint: Ollama requires at least one installed model. Install another model before deleting this one.

customWarnings.noGpu: If your computer does not have an NVIDIA graphics card, the model will use RAM. Make sure you have enough RAM available for the model size.
customWarnings.withGpu: If your computer has an NVIDIA graphics card, the model will use video memory (VRAM). Verify that your GPU has enough VRAM.
customWarnings.example: For example, a 7B parameter model needs approximately 4-5 GB of RAM or VRAM.

mlModels.title: Machine Learning Models
mlModels.description: HuggingFace models required for analysis. Downloaded models are automatically loaded into memory when the application starts.
mlModels.aboutDesc: These models are different from Ollama models. They are used for specific tasks like sentiment analysis, category classification, and subjectivity classification (Subjective / Mixed).

outputDir.title: Output Directory
outputDir.description: Folder where analysis results, visualizations, and processed data will be saved. Changes are applied automatically.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Choose the visual theme of the application. "System" follows the Windows setting.

phase7Config.title: Phase 7 — Summary Types
phase7Config.description: Select which summary types Phase 7 (Intelligent Summary) will generate. Fewer types selected = faster execution.
